title: (x) Greenlake Bar & Grill - ITC Goudy Sans (customized) {Marc O}
content:
I need identification of font used in nasty logo design for cafe. I went through a 97' Fontshop   
catalog with no luck. I need it ASAP for a job.   
 ![Greenlake Grill.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120719044900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1252.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content: It's ITC Goudy Sans bold, artificially condensed to about 70%, with the distinctive top serif/swash of the cap A removed.
Thanks. Timelines met with your help. Ole
